node.title: Elon Musk puts fate of $US21 billion Tesla stocks on Twitter poll
node.alt: Man in black leather jacket with sky and clouds behind
node.description: The world's richest person asked Twitter whether he should offload 10 per cent of his Tesla holdings, with a majority of users on the social media platform voting for the sale.
node.content:
["Tesla chief executive Elon Musk should sell 10 per cent\u00a0of his Tesla stock, says\u00a0a majority\u00a0of people who voted on his Twitter poll asking\u00a0users whether he should offload the stake.", "The world's richest person pledged to offload the shares if Twitter users approved the proposal.", "\"Much is made lately of unrealised gains being a means of tax avoidance, so I propose selling 10 per cent\u00a0of my Tesla stock,\" Mr Musk tweeted.", "The 50-year-old said\u00a0he does not take a cash salary or bonus\u00a0\"from anywhere\" and only has stock.", "The poll garnered more than 3.5 million votes, with 57.9 per cent of people voting in favour of the sale.\u00a0", "\"I was prepared to accept either outcome,\" Mr Musk said, after the voting ended.", "
Billions at stake in Twitter poll
", "Including stock options, Mr Musk owns a 23 per cent\u00a0stake in Tesla, the world's most valuable car company whose market value recently exceeded $US1 trillion ($1.35 trillion).", "He also owns other valuable companies, including Space X.", "Mr Musk has previously said he would have to exercise a large number of options in the next three months, which would create a big tax bill.", "Selling some of his stock could free up funds to pay the taxes.", "Last month, Tesla relocated its headquarters from California to Texas,\u00a0a move experts say will lead to a reduced tax bill because Texas has no income tax.", "
Tax reform debate as Biden looks to fund social spending\u00a0
", "Mr Musk's Twitter poll comes amid debate about billionaire tax avoidance in the United States.\u00a0", "US Senate Democrats have unveiled a proposal to tax billionaires' stocks and other tradeable assets to help finance President Joe Biden's social spending agenda and fill a loophole that has allowed them to defer capital gains taxes indefinitely.", "Mr Musk has criticised the proposal, saying, \"Eventually\u00a0they run out of other peoples'\u00a0money and then they come for you\".\u00a0", "US Senate Finance Committee Chairman Ron Wyden, who floated the tax proposal, responded to the poll\u00a0saying, \"Whether or not the world's wealthiest man pays any taxes at all shouldn't depend on the results of a Twitter poll\".", "\"It's time for the Billionaires' Income Tax,\" he said.\u00a0", "Mr Musk's brother, Kimbal Musk, last week sold 88,500 Tesla shares, becoming the latest board member to offload a large number of Tesla stocks, which hit record highs.", "A week ago, Elon\u00a0Musk said on Twitter that he would sell $US6 billion ($8 billion) in Tesla stock and donate it to the United Nations' World Food Program (WFP), provided the organisation disclosed more information about how it spent its money.\u00a0", "", "
Elon Musk's brother, Kimbal Musk, last week sold 88,500 Tesla shares, after the stock\u00a0hit record highs.\u00a0(Reuters:\u00a0Edgar Su)
", "ABC / Reuters"]
